evidence_extraction:
```json
[
  "my political, economic and social philosophy is black nationalism.",
  "The political philosophy of black nationalism only means that the black man should control the politics and the politicians in his own community.",
  "if you're black, you should be thinking black. And if you're black and you not thinking black at this late date, well, I'm sorry for you.",
  "This afternoon we want to talk about the ballot or the bullet.",
  "Whenever you got a racial powder keg sitting in your lap, you're in more trouble than if you had an atomic powder keg sitting in your lap.",
  "This is why I say it's the ballot or the bullet. It's liberty or it's death. It's freedom for everybody or freedom for nobody.",
  "What we will be doing is developing a situation, wherein, we will actually be able to create employment for the people in the community.",
  "And you and I have to make a start. And the best place to start is right in the community where we live.",
  "And once you…feel that this philosophy will solve your problem, go join any church where that's preached.",
  "when you spend your dollar out of the community in which you live, the community in which you spend your money becomes richer and richer, the community out of which you take your money becomes poorer and poorer.",
  "Anytime you have to rely upon your enemy for a job, you're in bad shape.",
  "These Northern Democrats are in cahoots with the southern Democrats. They're playing a giant con game, a political con game.",
  "Mr. Moderator, Rev. Cleage, brothers and sisters and friends, and I see some enemies.",
  "we have a fight that's common to all of us against a enemy who is common to all of us.",
  "And he is your enemy. You wouldn't be in this country if some enemy hadn't kidnapped you and brought you here.",
  "We got to unite. We got to work together in unity and harmony. And black nationalism is the key.",
  "Only, you think that integration will get you freedom; I think that separation will get me freedom. We both got the same objective, we just got different ways of getting' at it.",
  "if we keep our religion at home...when we come out here we have a fight that's common to all of us against a enemy who is common to all of us.",
  "Revolutions overturn systems. Revolutions destroy systems.",
  "I'm not for separation and you're not for integration, what you and I are for is freedom.",
  "And it will take black nationalism to bring about the freedom of 22 million Afro-Americans, here in this country, where we have suffered colonialism for the past 400 years.",
  "we will have to carry on a program, a political program, of reeducation – to open our people's eyes, make us become more politically conscious, politically mature.",
  "we should own and operate and control the economy of our community.",
  "join any kind of organization – civic, religious, fraternal, political or otherwise that's based on lifting the black man up and making him master of his own community."
]
```
